Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Structure - activity and dose - effect relationships of the antagonism of picrotoxin - induced seizures by cholecystokinin , fragments and analogues of cholecystokinin in mice .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Seizures |
|  |
| Seizures induced by picrotoxin |
|  |
| Seizures induced by picrotoxin in mice |

Note: "Seizures" is a disease entity in the paragraph, and "seizures induced by picrotoxin" and "seizures induced by picrotoxin in mice" are also disease entities because they are describing the effect of a specific substance (picrotoxin) on the body.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Seizures |
| Seizures induced by picrotoxin |

Note: "Seizures induced by picrotoxin in mice" is not a valid disease entity as it is not a disease, but rather an experimental model of seizures in mice.
